short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the astronomy picture of the day with a brief description.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See the astronomy picture of the day with a brief description which is released by NASA everyday.

Directions to use:-
1. Click on the extension icon in the top-right corner which displays the picture along with it's title and brief description.
2.To view the HD image in a new tab click on the image in the pop up.
